mapper.select:
select sum(t.actual_quote) from customer_application_info t, basic_customer_information b where t.customer_id = b.id
and b.USER_ID = #{userId}

select count(*) from t_sarm_specialasset t, basic_customer_information b where t.OWNERCODE = b.ty_customer_id
and b.USER_ID = #{userId}

select sum(tt.zh) from (select replace(t.apply_quota,',') as zh from BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION b,CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO t where b.id=t.customer_id and b.user_id=#{userId} and t.apply_quota not in ('此产品无申请金额'))tt
select sum(cc.applyQuota) from (SELECT DISTINCT (m.YWBH),m.REQLMT as applyQuota FROM MIBUSIDATA m,BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION b where m.id=b.TY_CUSTOMER_ID and b.user_id=#{userId}) cc

select count(*) from (select USERID from mibusidata where ( DELAYINTERESTDAYS not in ('0') and DELAYINTERESTDAYS is not null) or( DELAYAMTDAYS not in ('0') and DELAYAMTDAYS is not null)) cc where #{userId} in cc.USERID

select sum(cc.dkye+cc.bnqx+cc.bwqx) from (select USERID,dkye,bnqx,bwqx from mibusidata where ( DELAYINTERESTDAYS not in ('0') and DELAYINTERESTDAYS is not null) or( DELAYAMTDAYS not in ('0') and DELAYAMTDAYS is not null)) cc where #{userId} in cc.USERID
SELECT u.display_name from account_manager_retraining t, sys_user u where t.CUSTOMER_MANAGER_ID = u.id and t.retrain_id =#{id}
select count(*) from customer_application_info where 1=1 and status=#{noticeType} AND customer_id in( SELECT b.id FROM BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION b WHERE user_Id =#{userId})

select modified_time as creatime from customer_application_info where 1=1 and status=#{noticeType} AND customer_id in( SELECT b.id FROM BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION b WHERE user_Id =#{userId}) order by modified_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE T_CIPERSONBASINFO_COPY SET islook ='0' WHERE id=#{id} and cardnum=#{cardId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.display_name as displayName, t.chinese_name as chineseName,t.card_id as cardId, c.APPLY_QUOTA as applyQuota,p.product_name as productName,c.CREATED_TIME as creatime from BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION t, sys_user u,CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO c, product_attribute p where t.user_id=u.id and t.id=c.CUSTOMER_ID and c.PRODUCT_ID=p.id and c.STATUS=#{STATUS}
SELECT count(*) from BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION t, sys_user u,CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO c, product_attribute p where t.user_id=u.id and t.id=c.CUSTOMER_ID and c.PRODUCT_ID=p.id and c.STATUS=#{STATUS}

select c.id as id,c.customer_id as customerId,b.chinese_name as chineseName ,p.id as productId,p.product_name as productName,b.card_id as cardId,c.apply_quota as applyQuota ,c.status as status,t.FALLBACK_REASON as fallBackReason,s.display_name as displayName from customer_application_info c,basic_customer_information b,customer_application_process t,product_attribute p ,sys_user s where b.id=c.customer_id and c.id=t.APPLICATION_ID and c.product_id=p.id and b.user_id=#{userId} and s.id=b.user_id and (c.status='nopass_replenish' or c.status='returnedToFirst')

select c.id as id,c.customer_id as customerId,b.chinese_name as chineseName ,p.id as productId,p.product_name as productName,b.card_id as cardId,c.apply_quota as applyQuota ,c.status as status,t.REFUSAL_REASON as REFUSAL_REASON,s.display_name as displayName,c.created_time as creatime from customer_application_info c,basic_customer_information b,customer_application_process t,product_attribute p ,sys_user s where b.id=c.customer_id and c.id=t.APPLICATION_ID and c.product_id=p.id and b.user_id=#{userId} and s.id=b.user_id and (c.status='refuse' or c.status='nopass')

select c.id as id,c.customer_id as customerId,b.chinese_name as chineseName ,p.id as productId,p.product_name as productName,b.card_id as cardId,c.apply_quota as applyQuota ,c.status as status,c.final_approval as final_approval,c.actual_quote as actual_quote,s.display_name as displayName, c.created_time as creatime from customer_application_info c,basic_customer_information b,product_attribute p ,sys_user s where b.id=c.customer_id and c.product_id=p.id and b.user_id=#{userId} and s.id=b.user_id and (c.status='success' or c.status='approved')

select count(*) from customer_application_info c,basic_customer_information b,customer_application_process t,product_attribute p ,sys_user s where b.id=c.customer_id and c.id=t.APPLICATION_ID and c.product_id=p.id and b.user_id=#{userId} and s.id=b.user_id and (c.status='nopass_replenish' or c.status='returnedToFirst')

select c.modified_time as creatime from customer_application_info c,basic_customer_information b,customer_application_process t,product_attribute p ,sys_user s where b.id=c.customer_id and c.id=t.APPLICATION_ID and c.product_id=p.id and b.user_id=#{userId} and s.id=b.user_id and (c.status='nopass_replenish' or c.status='returnedToFirst')
order by c.modified_time desc
